t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: Fix Amazon Brand Registry & Trademark in 2025
s: Worse, your trademark might not even match your Amazon brand name. And yep, that small mismatch could quietly be killing 5% (or more) of your total sales. Sounds crazy, right? But it’s real. And the worst part? You probably wouldn’t even notice unless you knew exactly where to look. In this blog, we’ll break it all down — why brand registry matters, how mismatched trademarks mess things up, and what you can do today to fix ...
